info: s?nsisyust?n House of Learning is a Group 2 Independent Elementary School providing BC curriculum with integrated syilx perspectives

Westbank Child Development Centre (WCDC) is a provincially-licensed daycare facility. The daycare supports and promotes Okanagan syilx language and culture, offering culture and language sessions to all children. WFN Members receive a subsidized rate. Enrolment is open to everyone

WFN acquired the Fauquier Property through the Westside Road Interchange Land Exchange Project and has since developed a campsite hosting seven R.V. sites and two tent sites. Each site is equipped with water (WFN strongly recommends boiling water before consumption) and a fire pit.
